item.title: Amazon Webstore Clone
item.description: An amazon webstore clone built on the MERN stack. All of the frontend is built using typescript, while the backend was developed using vanilla js. It includes a backend API for orders, products, and users, a dynamic frontend with vanilla css and typescript, web tokens for user authentication, password salting and encryption, a react-redux store for statefulness, and detailed schema for data storage.
